long_description: Get geared up for a season of epic powder and full days of snowboarding with the women's 686 Mannual Patron waterproof, insulated pants. INFIDRY-10(TM) waterproof, breathable coating provides great protection in winter weather; fully taped seams don't allow moisture to sneak in. 40g polyester fiber insulation is rated to keep you warm in temperatures ranging from about 10degF to 32degF. Zippered hand pockets, zippered cargo pockets and dual back pockets give the pants a good look and offer up plenty of storage space. Swivel clip at the waistband gives you a convenient place to clip your gloves when they're not needed. Ventilate on the go with hidden inseam vents; mesh gussets prevent snow from sneaking in when the vents are open. Lower-leg openings expand in a snap for easy on and off. Gusseted crotch that allows a comfortable range of motion; waistband tabs let you adjust the fit. Snowboarding and skiing require a lot of movement and the 686 Mannual Patron insulated pants have an All-Access fit that has enough room to accommodate your every move.
short_description: Get geared up for a season of epic powder and full days of snowboarding with the women's 686 Mannual Patron waterproof, insulated pants.
